snippet.title: Mutazione - Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Announcing MUTAZIONE, a mutant soap opera where small-town gossip meets the supernatural.

Mutazione is an adventure game where the juicy personal drama is just as important as the high-stakes ‘adventure’ part of the story.

Explore the village, plant musical gardens, choose who you want to talk to, and find your way through an in-game week of small-town drama and scenic hangouts.

Coming 2019 to PS4 & PC/Mac

Sign-up for our low-traffic newsletter:
http://mutazionegame.com/

Presskit:
http://mutazionegame.com/presskit/

Follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/gutefabrik
